name: 10 Second Insults
description:
Offend your friends, family and your boss!

  • "You coarse eye pile"
  • "You absurd terrible hair eating Tony Abbott"
  • "You disappointment gone president"

And many more phrases your mother would be ashamed to hear you utter!

Inspired by word suggestion keyboards: use the on-screen keyboard to build procedurally-generated insults.

Developed in 1 week for the RMIT Game-a-Week 2019 program. The week's theme was '10 seconds or less'.
